description:
Are you the endurance champion of your running club? This merino running sock devours back-to-back long runs for breakfast and lunch. While the mesh panels on the top of the foot create a light and airy sensation, the cushion underneath is built for the long haul.

  • Made of merino wool, nylon and spandex
  • Performance fit ensures zero slipping, no bunching, and zero blisters. Cheers to concentrating on your run, not your feet
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Element Quarter Run Socks - Unisex
